summary.long: 2 John is a book of the New Testament.

verses.text: The elder unto the elect lady and her children, whom I love in truth; and not I only, but also all they that know the truth;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: for the truthâ€™s sake which abideth in us, and it shall be with us for ever:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Grace, mercy, peace shall be with us, from God the Father, and from Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I rejoice greatly that I have found certain of thy children walking in truth, even as we received commandment from the Father.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote to thee a new commandment, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And this is love, that we should walk after his commandments. This is the commandment, even as ye heard from the beginning, that ye should walk in it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For many deceivers are gone forth into the world, even they that confess not that Jesus Christ cometh in the flesh. This is the deceiver and the antichrist.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Look to yourselves, that ye lose not the things which we have wrought, but that ye receive a full reward.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Whosoever goeth onward and abideth not in the teaching of Christ, hath not God: he that abideth in the teaching, the same hath both the Father and the Son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: If any one cometh unto you, and bringeth not this teaching, receive him not into your house, and give him no greeting:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: for he that giveth him greeting partaketh in his evil works.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Having many things to write unto you, I would not write them with paper and ink: but I hope to come unto you, and to speak face to face, that your joy may be made full.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The children of thine elect sister salute thee.
verses.speaker: Narrator
